name: POP_1_Support_for_Health_Maintenance__Preventative_Care_and_Wellness
title: POP.1 Support for Health Maintenance, Preventative Care and Wellness (Header)
description: Evaluate patient information to provide alerts, notifications and reminders regarding health, preventative care and wellness.
purpose: The system assists in determining ongoing and pertinent communications from the provider to patient to promote health, preventative care and wellness.
